distance.name: Random Forest Distance
distance.shortDescription: A distance measure based on random forest proximity.
distance.fullDescription:
The distance measure is based on the proximity induced by a random forest* model.
The proximity of two rows is the number of trees in which the rows end up in the same leaf divided by the total number of trees.
(*) RANDOM FORESTS is a registered trademark of Minitab, LLC and is used with Minitabâ€™s permission.
